page.title: 09EGG PRODUCTION UNIT
page.content: The poultry houses have been there for 18 years.The area was chosen was chosen because of its isolation and less chance of disease.The present fifm has been there 4years.{Various {breeds}of hen are used.They begin to lay at 16 weeks and carry on laying for 72 weeks.The hens are housed in {battery cages}and are fed on a balanced poultry ration of 120 tons a week.Fowls are{vaccinated}against fowl pest.Eggs are{transported}daily in trolleys of trays in a special wagon to Yorkshire Egg Producers{Hen manure} is removed by contractor.It has a { {high nitogen content}and is invaluable in increasing the productivity of the land.
